author: WSJ Staff
title: Brexit & Beyond:Brexit Looms and Eurostat Excludes U.K., Draghi Warns on Tariff Threat, Swiss Firm Become Casualty of Russian Sanctions
text: Brexit & Beyond: Europe in Flux is The Wall Street Journal’s round-up of news and analysis of how Brexit will affect global business, economies and finance. You can sign up here.
